effect.short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

flavorTexts.text:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and
attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land
more easily.
